General.Name: Pelayaran Nasional Bina Buana Raya
General.Description: PT Pelayaran Nasional Bina Buana Raya Tbk, a shipping company, provides marine logistics services in Indonesia. The company operates in two segments, Self-Propelled Barge, and Offshore Support Vessel. It offers transportation services for various bulk mining materials, such as coal for the transshipment or delivery through rivers and coastal routes. As of March 31, 2023, the company owns 1 self-propelled barge and 4 offshore support vessels. It also charters its vessels to oil and gas companies. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: TCC Batavia Tower One, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10220
